title: React parent call child to update state using Hooks
Scroll of Menu Crashes List View :: SizedBox()
description:
ListView Builder can not operate under null premises.  Must at the bare minimum provide empty parameters.

In this situation, calculating content to supply total height for nametags.  Since, list is empty height is zero.  Must return zero as opposed to null or nothing.

entry.title: Scroll of Menu Crashes List View
entry.description:
For recommendations when empty, I returned a SizedBox with no height, needs height for ListView.builder

The issue: when you use a Container or Widget without child and or without height property inside ListVIew The solution: Just give height property to Widget that inside ListView.

This is my code, that's worked for me

.......
body: ListView(
          shrinkWrap: true,
          children: <Widget>[
            Auth ? Container(height: 1): signUpWidget() , // Add height property to Container
            .....
            ......
          ]
       )

-> Probably means error in Android Folder that is not caught by VS code.
Commands to rebuild android folder:
*delete 'build' folder
-dependecy issue-> delete 'pubspec.lock' && 'build' folder
flutter doctor (checks connection)
flutter clean
flutter run

flutter create (if delete android folder, should rebuild all files)

title: Dart Duplicate Name Import Work Arounds
State Provider with ListView.builder() or GridView.builder()
description:
***NOTE*** using ListView.builder() or GridView.builder()
-*okay with rerender entire list, but on single list items use => value method
-Since only renders visable items, it reuses widgets in list, so need to use 'value' with provider instead of context
Error: UI data, not updating or syncing

title: @required attribute in Flutter
Font Text Styling
description:
*Insert .ttf files into project at project/assets/fonts/

In pubspec.yaml
fonts:
    - family: OpenSans
      fonts:
        - asset: assets/fonts/OpenSans-Regular.ttf
        - asset: assets/fonts/OpenSans-Bold.ttf
          weight: 700

MaterialApp(
      title: 'Personal Expenses',
      theme: ThemeData(
          primarySwatch: Colors.deepOrange,
          fontFamily: 'QuickSand',
          textTheme: ThemeData.light().textTheme.copyWith(
                  title: TextStyle(fontFamily: 'OpenSans', fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, fontSize: 20)), //everything marked as title
          appBarTheme: AppBarTheme(
              textTheme: ThemeData.light().textTheme.copyWith(
                  title: TextStyle(fontFamily: 'OpenSans', fontSize: 22),
                  button: TextStyle(color: Colors.white)))),
      home: MyHomePage(),
    );

Text Widgets:
Text(tx.title,
                                style: TextStyle(
                                    fontSize: 18, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold)),
                            Text(DateFormat.yMMMd().format(tx.date),
                                style: TextStyle(
                                    fontSize: 13, color: Colors.grey))

Selection & Reference Focus
Selection Issue - slatejs
description:
'autoFocus' saves last selection, yet browser shifts focus to header when onCLick, when focus is changed back to Editor (by clicking on editor) without option new focus is created (if not the same, addMark from header click is void) or jups to last focus with auto focus.  {Focus is curser}

Solved with React.forwardReference and onMouseDown insead of onClick

title: Console Error: ECONNRESET
description:
Gravity error, indicating TCP connection lost after server.js file crashes.
Console Error: invalid import or data no defined.
It crashed because 'let blaskList[];' was removed.  so blackList.forEach was invalid.
Also, using importing 'fs' with ES6, needed ES5: 'const fs import {'fs'}'

Error: read ECONNRESET
at TCP.onStreamRead(internal/stream_base_commons.js:201:27) {
errno: 'ECONNRESET',
code: 'ECONNRESET',
syscall: 'read'
}

title: Console Error: 'EADDRINUSE'
description:
Console Error: localhost port conflict, port already in use
Emitted 'error' event on Server instance at:
    at emitErrorNT (net.js:1327:8)
    at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:80:21) {
  code: 'EADDRINUSE',
  errno: 'EADDRINUSE',
  syscall: 'listen',
  address: '::',
  port: 7500
}
